professionalExperience.title: Cybersecurity Research Assistant
responsibilities: Conduct vulnerability assessments on web applications and network infrastructure
Develop and test security tools using Python for penetration testing exercises
Assist in documenting security best practices and creating educational materials
Collaborate with faculty on research projects related to network security and intrusion detection

professionalExperience.title: Security Analyst Intern
responsibilities: Monitored network traffic for suspicious activities using Wireshark and custom Python scripts
Participated in vulnerability scanning and assessment activities using Nessus
Assisted in incident response simulations and documentation of findings
Contributed to the development of security awareness training materials

internships.title: Cybersecurity Intern
responsibilities: Configured and maintained SIEM solutions for log analysis and threat detection
Performed basic malware analysis using sandbox environments
Assisted in penetration testing of internal applications
Documented security vulnerabilities and recommended remediation steps

internships.title: IT Security Volunteer
responsibilities: Helped implement basic security measures for the college network
Created documentation for security policies and procedures
Conducted basic security awareness training for staff members
Assisted in troubleshooting security-related issues for faculty and students

achievements.title: Capture The Flag (CTF) Competition Winner
achievements.description: First place in university-wide cybersecurity competition, demonstrating skills in cryptography, web security, and reverse engineering (2022).

achievements.title: Security Tool Development
achievements.description: Developed a custom network monitoring tool that was adopted by the university security lab for educational purposes.

achievements.title: Security Certification Achievement
achievements.description: Completed five professional certifications in cybersecurity and IT security within one year while maintaining academic excellence.

achievements.title: Cybersecurity Workshop Leader
achievements.description: Organized and led workshops on ethical hacking and penetration testing for junior students, enhancing the security awareness culture on campus.
